page.title: 12Housing in Sidcup Area.
page.content: Sidcup is a very built up area. There are vsry few Council Properties as the area is a very wealthy one. {Semi-Detached:}This is the most common type of housing in Sidcup and Bexley. Most of them were built in the 1930's. { Detached:}There are very few detached houses in the area. They were built either very recently or pre-1930's. { Terraced:}These are the most common type of house after semi-detached. {Flats:}There are several blocks of flats in the area, most common in Sidcup. More than half the blocks are old peoples flats. { Bungalows:}These are the least common type of housing. They are all recently built and again the majority are for old people.
